00025         function max_downloads($buffer, $item)
00026         {
00027                 return $item->downloads > $buffer ? $item->downloads : $buffer;
00028         }
00029         
00030         if (count($this->artifacts) > 0)
00031         {
00032                 $max_downloads = array_reduce($this->artifacts, 'max_downloads', 0);
00033                 
00034                 $row = 0;
00035                 foreach ($this->artifacts as $artifact)
00036                 {
00037 ?>

00040                         <?php printf(l('%s downloads'), $artifact->downloads); ?>

00043                         style="width:<?php echo floor(450 * $artifact->downloads / $max_downloads); ?>px">
